content.gatha1: Parisaṅkupatho nāma, gijjhapantho sanantano;
content.gathalast: Tesaṃ ajagaramedaṃ, accahāsi pahuttatopahuttatobahuttasopahūtasopahūtasobahudhaso .
content.gatha1: Pitā ca puttaṃ avaca, jānaṃ uccaṃ papātinaṃ;
content.gathalast: Supattaṃ thāmasampannaṃpakkhasampannaṃpakkhasampannaṃpakkhasampannaṃ , tejassiṃ dūragāminaṃ.
content.gatha1: Pariplavantaṃ pathaviṃ, yadā tāta vijānahi;
content.gathalast: Tato tāta nivattassu, māssu etto paraṃ gami.
content.gatha1: Udapattosiuddhaṃ pattosiuddhaṃ pattosi vegena, balī pakkhī dijuttamo;
content.gathalast: Olokayanto vakkaṅgo, pabbatāni vanāni ca.
content.gatha1: Addassa pathaviṃ gijjho, yathāsāsiyathāssāsiyathāssāsiyathāssāsi pitussutaṃ;
content.gathalast: Sāgarena parikkhittaṃ, cakkaṃva parimaṇḍalaṃ.
content.gatha1: Tañca so samatikkamma, paramevaccavattathaparameva pavattathaparameva pavattatha ;
content.gathalast: Tañca vātasikhā tikkhā, accahāsi baliṃ dijaṃ.
content.gatha1: Nāsakkhātigato poso, punadeva nivattituṃ;
content.gathalast: Dijo byasanamāpādi, verambhānaṃverambānaṃverambānaṃ vasaṃ gato.
content.gatha1: Tassa puttā ca dārā ca, ye caññe anujīvino;
content.gathalast: Sabbe byasanamāpāduṃ, anovādakare dije.
content.gatha1: Evampi idha vuḍḍhānaṃ, yo vākyaṃ nāvabujjhati;
content.gathalast: Sa ve byasanaṃ pappoti, akatvā vuḍḍhasāsananti.
content.gatha1: Puthusaddo samajano, na bālo koci maññatha;
content.gathalast: Saṅghasmiṃ bhijjamānasmiṃ, nāññaṃ bhiyyo amaññaruṃ.
content.gatha1: Parimuṭṭhā paṇḍitābhāsā, vācāgocarabhāṇino;
content.gathalast: Yāvicchanti mukhāyāmaṃ, yena nītā na taṃ vidū.
content.gatha1: Akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ, ajini maṃ ahāsi me;
content.gathalast: Ye ca taṃ upanayhanti, veraṃ tesaṃ na sammati.
content.gatha1: Akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ, ajini maṃ ahāsi me;
content.gathalast: Ye ca taṃ nupanayhanti, veraṃ tesūpasammati.
content.gatha1: Na hi verena verāni, sammantīdha kudācanaṃ;
content.gathalast: Averena ca sammanti, esa dhammo sanantano.
content.gatha1: Pare ca na vijānanti, mayamettha yamāmase;
content.gathalast: Ye ca tattha vijānanti, tato sammanti medhagā.
content.gatha1: Aṭṭhicchinnā pāṇaharā, gavassagavāssagavāssagavāssa dhanahārino;
content.gathalast: Raṭṭhaṃ vilumpamānānaṃ, tesampi hoti saṅgati;
Kasmā tumhāka no siyā.
content.gatha1: Sace labhetha nipakaṃ sahāyaṃ, saddhiṃcaraṃ sādhuvihāridhīraṃ;
content.gathalast: Abhibhuyya sabbāni parissayāni, careyya tenattamano satīmā.
content.gatha1: No ce labhetha nipakaṃ sahāyaṃ, saddhiṃcaraṃ sādhuvihāridhīraṃ;
content.gathalast: Rājāva raṭṭhaṃ vijitaṃ pahāya, eko care mātaṅgaraññeva nāgo.
content.gatha1: Ekassa caritaṃ seyyo, natthi bāle sahāyatā;
content.gathalast: Eko care na pāpāni kayirā, appossukko mātaṅgaraññeva nāgoti.
content.gatha1: Dumo yadā hoti phalūpapanno, bhuñjanti naṃ vihaṅgamāvihagāvihagā sampatantā;
content.gathalast: Khīṇanti ñatvāna dumaṃ phalaccaye ñatvā dumapphalaccayena (ka.), disodisaṃ yanti tato vihaṅgamā.
content.gatha1: Cara cārikaṃ lohitatuṇḍa māmari, kiṃ tvaṃ suva sukkhadumamhi jhāyasi;
content.gathalast: Tadiṅgha maṃ brūhi vasantasannibha, kasmā suva sukkhadumaṃ na riñcasi.
content.gatha1: Ye ve sakhīnaṃ sakhāro bhavanti, pāṇaccayepāṇaṃ caje dukkhasukhesu haṃsa;
content.gathalast: Khīṇaṃ akhīṇanti na taṃ jahanti, santo sataṃ dhammamanussarantā.
content.gatha1: Sohaṃ sataṃ aññatarosmi haṃsa, ñātī ca me hoti sakhā ca rukkho;
content.gathalast: Taṃ nussahe jīvikattho pahātuṃ, khīṇanti ñatvāna na hesa dhammo na sosa (ka.), na esa (syā.).
content.gatha1: Sādhu sakkhi kataṃ hoti, metti saṃsati santhavomittaṃ saṅgati sandhavo ;
content.gathalast: Sacetaṃ dhammaṃ rocesi, pāsaṃsosi vijānataṃ.
content.gatha1: So te suva varaṃ dammi, pattayāna vihaṅgama;
content.gathalast: Varaṃ varassu vakkaṅga, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi.
content.gatha1: Varañca me haṃsa bhavaṃ dadeyya, ayañca rukkho punarāyuṃ labhetha;
content.gathalast: So sākhavā phalimā saṃvirūḷho, madhutthiko tiṭṭhatu sobhamāno.
content.gatha1: Taṃ passa samma phalimaṃ uḷāraṃ, sahāva te hotu udumbarena;
content.gathalast: So sākhavā phalimā saṃvirūḷho, madhutthiko tiṭṭhatu sobhamāno.
content.gatha1: Evaṃ sakka sukhī hohi, saha sabbehi ñātibhi;
content.gathalast: Yathāhamajja sukhito, disvāna saphalaṃ dumaṃ.
content.gatha1: Suvassa ca varaṃ datvā, katvāna saphalaṃ dumaṃ;
content.gathalast: Pakkāmi saha bhariyāya, devānaṃ nandanaṃ vananti.
content.gatha1: Santi rukkhā haripattāharitapattāharitapattāharitapattā , dumā nekaphalā bahū;
content.gathalast: Kasmā nu sukkhesukkha koḷāpe, suvassa nirato mano.
content.gatha1: Phalassa upabhuñjimhā, nekavassagaṇe bahū;
content.gathalast: Aphalampi viditvāna, sāva metti yathā pure.
content.gatha1: Sukhañca rukkhaṃ koḷāpaṃ, opattamaphalaṃ dumaṃ;
content.gathalast: Ohāya sakuṇā yanti, kiṃ dosaṃ passase dija.
content.gatha1: Ye phalatthā sambhajanti, aphaloti jahanti naṃ;
content.gathalast: Attatthapaññā dummedhā, te honti pakkhapātino.
content.gatha1: Sādhu sakkhi kataṃ hoti, metti saṃsati santhavo;
content.gathalast: Sacetaṃ dhammaṃ rocesi, pāsaṃsosi vijānataṃ.
content.gatha1: So te suva varaṃ dammi, pattayāna vihaṅgama;
content.gathalast: Varaṃ varassu vakkaṅga, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi.
content.gatha1: Api nāma naṃ passeyyaṃapi nāma naṃ puna passeapi nāma naṃ puna passe , sapattaṃ saphalaṃ dumaṃ;
content.gathalast: Daliddova nidhi laddhā, nandeyyāhaṃ punappunaṃ.
content.gatha1: Tato amatamādāya, abhisiñci mahīruhaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tassa sākhā virūhiṃsu virūḷhassa (ka.), sītacchāyā manoramā.
content.gatha1: Evaṃ sakka sukhī hohi, saha sabbehi ñātibhi;
content.gathalast: Yathāhamajja sukhito, disvāna saphalaṃ dumaṃ.
content.gatha1: Suvassa ca varaṃ datvā, katvāna saphalaṃ dumaṃ;
content.gathalast: Pakkāmi saha bhariyāya, devānaṃ nandanaṃ vananti.
content.gatha1: Sutaṃ metaṃ mahābrahme, kāme bhuñjati hārito;
content.paragraph: Kaccetaṃ vacanaṃ tucchaṃ, kacci suddho iriyyasi.
content.gatha1: Evametaṃ mahārāja, yathā te vacanaṃ sutaṃ;
content.gathalast: Kummaggaṃ paṭipannosmi, mohaneyyesu mucchito.
content.gatha1: Aduāduādu paññā kimatthiyā, nipuṇā sādhucintinī cintanī (sī. pī.);
content.gathalast: Yāya uppatitaṃ rāgaṃ, kiṃ mano na vinodaye.
content.gatha1: Cattārome mahārāja, loke atibalā bhusā;
content.gathalast: Rāgo doso mado moho, yattha paññā na gādhati.
content.gatha1: Arahā sīlasampanno, suddho carati hārito;
content.gathalast: Medhāvī paṇḍito ceva, iti no sammato bhavaṃ.
content.gatha1: Medhāvīnampi hiṃsanti, isiṃ dhammaguṇe rataṃ;
content.gathalast: Vitakkā pāpakā rāja, subhā rāgūpasaṃhitā.
content.gatha1: Uppannāyaṃ sarīrajo, rāgo vaṇṇavidūsano tava;
content.gathalast: Taṃ pajaha bhaddamatthu te, bahunnāsi medhāvisammato.
content.gatha1: Te andhakārake karaṇe (sī. syā. pī.) kāme, bahudukkhe mahāvise;
content.gathalast: Tesaṃ mūlaṃ gavesissaṃ, checchaṃ rāgaṃ sabandhanaṃ.
content.gatha1: Idaṃ vatvāna hārito, isi saccaparakkamo;
content.gathalast: Kāmarāgaṃ virājetvā, brahmalokūpago ahūti.
content.gatha1: Bahussutaṃ cittakathiṃcittakathaṃcittakathaṃ , gaṅgā vahati pāṭaliṃpāṭalaṃpāṭalaṃ ;
content.gathalast: Vuyhamānaka bhaddante, ekaṃ me dehi gāthakaṃgītakaṃgītakaṃ .
content.gatha1: Yena siñcanti dukkhitaṃ, yena siñcanti āturaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tassa majjhe marissāmi, jātaṃ saraṇato bhayaṃ.
content.gatha1: Yattha bījāni rūhanti, sattā yattha patiṭṭhitā;
content.gathalast: Sā me sīsaṃ nipīḷeti, jātaṃ saraṇato bhayaṃ.
content.gatha1: Yena bhattāni paccanti, sītaṃ yena vihaññati;
content.gathalast: So maṃ ḍahatidayhati gattāni, jātaṃ saraṇato bhayaṃ.
content.gatha1: Yena bhuttenabhattenabhattena yāpenti, puthū brāhmaṇakhattiyā;
content.gathalast: So maṃ bhutto byāpādeti, jātaṃ saraṇato bhayaṃ.
content.gatha1: Gimhānaṃ pacchime māse, vātamicchanti paṇḍitā;
content.gathalast: So maṃso meso me bhañjati gattāni, jātaṃ saraṇato bhayaṃ.
content.gatha1: Yaṃ nissitā jagatiruhaṃ, svāyaṃ aggiṃ pamuñcati;
content.gathalast: Disā bhajatha vakkaṅgā, jātaṃ saraṇato bhayaṃ.
content.gatha1: Yamānayiṃ somanassaṃ, māliniṃ candanussadaṃ;
content.gathalast: Sā maṃ gharā nicchubhatinīharatinīharati , jātaṃ saraṇato bhayaṃ.
content.gatha1: Yena jātena nandissaṃ, yassa ca bhavamicchisaṃ;
content.gathalast: So maṃ gharā nicchubhatinīharatinīharati , jātaṃ saraṇato bhayaṃ.
content.gatha1: Suṇantu me jānapadā, negamā ca samāgatā;
content.gathalast: Yatodakaṃ tadādittaṃ, yato khemaṃ tato bhayaṃ.
content.gatha1: Rājā vilumpate raṭṭhaṃ, brāhmaṇo ca purohito;
content.gathalast: Attaguttā viharatha, jātaṃ saraṇato bhayanti.
content.gatha1: Assa indasamo rāja, accantaṃ ajarāmaro;
content.gathalast: Sace tvaṃ yaññaṃ yājeyya, isiṃ lomasakassapaṃ.
content.gatha1: Sasamuddapariyāyaṃ, mahiṃ sāgarakuṇḍalaṃ;
content.gathalast: Na icche saha nindāya, evaṃ seyya sayha (sī. syā. pī.) vijānahi.
content.gatha1: Dhiratthu taṃ yasalābhaṃ, dhanalābhañca brāhmaṇa;
content.gathalast: Yā vutti vinipātena, adhammacaraṇena vā.
content.gatha1: Api ce pattamādāya, anagāro paribbaje;
content.gathalast: Sāyeva jīvikā seyyo, yā cādhammena esanā.
content.gatha1: Api ce pattamādāya, anagāro paribbaje;
content.gathalast: Aññaṃ ahiṃsayaṃ loke, api rajjena taṃ varaṃ.
content.gatha1: Balaṃ cando balaṃ suriyo, balaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇā;
content.gathalast: Balaṃ velā samuddassa, balātibalamitthiyo.
content.gatha1: Yathā uggatapaṃ santaṃ, isiṃ lomasakassapaṃ;
content.gathalast: Pitu atthā candavatī, vājapeyyaṃvācapeyyaṃvācapeyyaṃ ayājayi.
content.gatha1: Taṃ lobhapakataṃ kammaṃ, kaṭukaṃ kāmahetukaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tassa mūlaṃ gavesissaṃ, checchaṃ rāgaṃ sabandhanaṃ.
content.gatha1: Dhiratthu kāme subahūpi loke, tapova seyyo kāmaguṇehi rāja;
content.gathalast: Tapo karissāmi pahāya kāme, taveva raṭṭhaṃ candavatī ca hotūti.
content.gatha1: Kāsāyavatthe sakuṇe vadāmi, duve duve nandamanenandimanenandimane carante;
content.gathalast: Kaṃ aṇḍajaṃ aṇḍajā mānusesu, jātiṃ pasaṃsanti tadiṅgha brūtha.
content.gatha1: Amhe manussesu manussahiṃsa, anubbateanupubbake cakkavāke vadanti;
content.gathalast: Kalyāṇabhāvamhe bhāva’mha (sī. pī.) dijesu sammatā, abhirūpāabhītarūpāabhītarūpāabhītarūpā vicarāma aṇṇave. ( ) (na ghāsahetūpi karoma pāpaṃ) (ka.)
content.gatha1: Kiṃ aṇṇave kāni phalāni bhuñje, maṃsaṃ kuto khādatha cakkavākā;
content.gathalast: Kiṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjatha vo anomā abhiṇhaṃ (ka.), balañca vaṇṇo ca anapparūpāanapparūpoanapparūpoanapparūpo .
content.gatha1: Na aṇṇave santi phalāni dhaṅka, maṃsaṃ kuto khādituṃ cakkavāke;
content.gathalast: Sevālabhakkhamha bhakkhimha (ka.) apāṇabhojanāavākabhojanāavākabhojanā , na ghāsahetūpi karoma pāpaṃ.
content.gatha1: Na me idaṃ ruccati cakkavāka, asmiṃ bhave bhojanasannikāso;
content.gathalast: Ahosi pubbe tato me aññathā, icceva me vimati ettha jātā.
content.gatha1: Ahampi maṃsāni phalāni bhuñje, annāni ca loṇiyateliyāni;
content.gatha2: Rasaṃ manussesu labhāmi bhottuṃ, sūrova saṅgāmamukhaṃ vijetvā;
content.gathalast: Na ca me tādiso vaṇṇo, cakkavāka yathā tava.
content.gatha1: Asuddhabhakkhosi khaṇānupātī, kicchena te labbhati annapānaṃ;
content.gathalast: Na tussasī rukkhaphalehi dhaṅka, maṃsāni vā yāni susānamajjhe.
content.gatha1: Yo sāhasena adhigamma bhoge, paribhuñjati dhaṅka khaṇānupātī;
content.gathalast: Tato upakkosati naṃ sabhāvo, upakkuṭṭho vaṇṇabalaṃ jahāti.
content.gatha1: Appampi ce nibbutiṃ bhuñjatī yadi, asāhasena aparūpaghātī asāhasenānupaghātino (ka.);
content.gathalast: Balañca vaṇṇo ca tadassa hoti, na hi sabbo āhāramayena vaṇṇoti.
content.gatha1: Sutitikkhaṃ araññamhi, pantamhi sayanāsane;
content.gathalast: Ye ca gāme titikkhanti, te uḷāratarā tayā.
content.gatha1: Araññā gāmamāgamma, kiṃsīlaṃ kiṃvataṃ ahaṃ;
content.gathalast: Purisaṃ tāta seveyyaṃ, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito.
content.gatha1: Yo teyo taṃyo taṃyo taṃyo taṃ vissāsaye tāta, vissāsañca khameyya te;
content.gathalast: Sussūsī ca titikkhī ca, taṃ bhajehi ito gato.
content.gatha1: Yassa kāyena vācāya, manasā natthi dukkaṭaṃ;
content.gathalast: Urasīva patiṭṭhāya, taṃ bhajehi ito gato.
content.gatha1: Yo ca dhammena carati, carantopi na maññati;
content.gathalast: Visuddhakāriṃ sappaññaṃ, taṃ bhajehi ito gato.
content.gatha1: Haliddirāgaṃ kapicittaṃ, purisaṃ rāgavirāginaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tādisaṃ tāta mā sevi, nimmanussampi ce siyā.
content.gatha1: Āsīvisaṃva kupitaṃ, mīḷhalittaṃ mahāpathaṃ;
content.gathalast: Ārakā parivajjehi, yānīva visamaṃ pathaṃ.
content.gatha1: Anatthā tāta vaḍḍhanti, bālaṃ accupasevato;
content.gathalast: Māssu bālena saṃgacchi, amitteneva sabbadā.
content.gatha1: Taṃ tāhaṃ tāta yācāmi, karassu vacanaṃ mama;
content.gathalast: Māssu bālena saṃgacchisaṃgañchisaṃgañchi , dukkho bālehi saṅgamoti.
content.gatha1: Kuto nu āgacchatha bho tayo janā, svāgatā ethasvāgataṃ etthasvāgataṃ ettha nisīdathāsane;
content.gathalast: Kaccittha bhonto kusalaṃ anāmayaṃ, cirassamabbhāgamanaṃ hi vo idha.
content.gatha1: Ahameva eko idha majja patto, na cāpi me dutiyo koci vijjati;
content.gathalast: Kimeva sandhāya te bhāsitaṃ ise, ‘‘kuto nu āgacchatha bho tayo janā’’.
content.gatha1: Tuvañca eko bhariyā ca te piyā, samuggapakkhittanikiṇṇamantare ;
content.gathalast: Sā rakkhitā kucchigatāvakucchigatā ca te sadā, vāyussa harissa (ka.) puttena sahā tahiṃ ratā.
content.gatha1: Saṃviggarūpo isinā viyākatopabyākatobyākatobyākato , so dānavo tattha samuggamuggili;
content.gathalast: Addakkhi bhariyaṃ suci māladhāriniṃ, vāyussa puttena sahā tahiṃ rataṃ.
content.gatha1: Sudiṭṭharūpamuggatapānuvattināsudiṭṭharūpuggatapānuvattināsudiṭṭharūpuggatapānuvattināsudiṭṭharūpuggatapānuvattinā , hīnā narā ye pamadāvasaṃ gatā;
content.gathalast: Yathā have pāṇarivettha rakkhitā, duṭṭhā mayī aññamabhippamodayi.
content.gatha1: Divā ca ratto ca mayā upaṭṭhitā, tapassinā jotirivā vane vasaṃ;
content.gathalast: Sā dhammamukkamma adhammamācari, akiriyarūpo pamadāhi santhavo.
content.gatha1: Sarīramajjhamhi ṭhitātimaññahaṃ, mayhaṃ ayanti asatiṃ asaññataṃ;
content.gathalast: Sā dhammamukkamma adhammamācari, akiriyarūpo pamadāhi santhavo.
content.gatha1: Surakkhitaṃ meti kathaṃ nu vissase, anekacittāsu na hatthianekacittā puna hettha rakkhaṇā;
content.gathalast: Etā hi pātālapapātasannibhā, etthappamatto byasanaṃ nigacchati.
content.gatha1: Tasmā hi te sukhino vītasokā, ye mātugāmehi caranti nissaṭā;
content.gathalast: Etaṃ sivaṃ uttamamābhipatthayaṃ, na mātugāmehi kareyya santhavanti.
content.gatha1: Na kho me ruccati āḷi, pūtimaṃsassa pekkhanā;
content.gathalast: Etādisā sakhārasmā, ārakā parivajjaye.
content.gatha1: Ummattikā ayaṃ veṇī, vaṇṇeti patino sakhiṃ;
content.gathalast: Pajjhāyipajjhātipajjhātipajjhāyatipajjhāyati paṭigacchantiṃ, āgataṃ meṇḍameḷameḷa mātaraṃ.
content.gatha1: Tvaṃ khosi samma ummatto, dummedho avicakkhaṇo;
content.gathalast: Yo tvaṃso tvaṃ matālayaṃ katvā, akālena vipekkhasi.
content.gatha1: Na akāle vipekkheyya, kāle pekkheyya paṇḍito;
content.gathalast: Pūtimaṃsova pajjhāyipajjhātipajjhātipajjhāyatipajjhāyati , yo akāle vipekkhati.
content.gatha1: Piyaṃ kho āḷi me hotu, puṇṇapattaṃ dadāhi me;
content.gathalast: Pati sañjīvito mayhaṃ, eyyāsi piyapucchikā pucchitā (syā. ka.).
content.gatha1: Piyaṃ kho āḷi te hotu, puṇṇapattaṃ dadāmi te;
content.gathalast: Mahatā parivārenaparihārena , essaṃesaṃesaṃ kayirāhikayirāsi bhojanaṃ.
content.gatha1: Kīdiso tuyhaṃ parivāro, yesaṃ kāhāmi bhojanaṃ;
content.gathalast: Kiṃnāmakā ca te sabbe, taṃ te (sī. syā. pī.) me akkhāhi pucchitā.
content.gatha1: Māliyo caturakkho ca, piṅgiyo atha jambuko;
content.gathalast: Ediso mayhaṃ parivāro, tesaṃ kayirāhikayirāsi bhojanaṃ.
content.gatha1: Nikkhantāya agārasmā, bhaṇḍakampi vinassati;
content.gathalast: Ārogyaṃ āḷino vajjaṃvacchaṃ , idheva vasa māgamāti.
content.gatha1: Yo te puttake akhādi, dinnabhatto adūsake;
content.gathalast: Tasmiṃ dāṭhaṃ nipātehi, mā te muccittha jīvato.
content.gatha1: Ākiṇṇaluddo puriso, dhāticelaṃva makkhito;
content.gathalast: Padesaṃ taṃ na passāmi, yattha dāṭhaṃ nipātaye.
content.gatha1: Akataññussa posassa, niccaṃ vivaradassino;
content.gathalast: Sabbaṃ ce pathaviṃ dajjā, neva naṃ abhirādhaye.
content.gatha1: Kinnu subāhu taramānarūpo, paccāgatosi saha māṇavena;
content.gathalast: Kiṃ kiccamatthaṃ idhamatthi tuyhaṃ, akkhāhi me pucchito etamatthaṃ.
content.gatha1: Yo te sakhā daddaro sādhurūpo, tassa vadhaṃ parisaṅkāmi ajja;
content.gathalast: Purisassa kammāyatanāni sutvā, nāhaṃ sukhiṃ daddaraṃ ajja maññe.
content.gatha1: Kānissa kammāyatanāni assu, purisassa vuttisamodhānatāya;
content.gathalast: Kaṃ vā paṭiññaṃ purisassa sutvā, parisaṅkasi daddaraṃ māṇavena.
content.gatha1: Ciṇṇā kaliṅgā caritā vaṇijjā, vettācaro saṅkupathopi ciṇṇo;
content.gathalast: Naṭehi ciṇṇaṃ saha vākurehivākarehivākarehivākarehivāgurehi , daṇḍena yuddhampi samajjamajjhe.
content.gatha1: Baddhā kulīkākuliṅkākuliṅkā mitamāḷhakena, akkhā jitāakkhācitāakkhācitā saṃyamo abbhatīto;
content.gathalast: Abbāhitaṃappahitaṃappahitaṃabbūhitaṃabbūhitaṃabbūhitaṃ pubbakaṃpupphakaṃpupphakaṃ aḍḍharattaṃ, hatthā daḍḍhā piṇḍapaṭiggahena.
content.gatha1: Tānissa kammāyatanāni assu, purisassa vuttisamodhānatāya;
content.gathalast: Yathā ayaṃ dissati lomapiṇḍo, gāvo hatā kiṃ pana daddarassāti.
content.gatha1: Varagijjha samajjana haṃsavaro, nidhisavhaya hārita pāṭaliko;
content.gathalast: Ajarāmara dhaṅka titikkha kuto, atha dvādasa pekkhana daddaribhīti.
